subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Yankees’ general manager Brian Cashman said that despite Hank Steinbrenner’s insistence that Joba Chamberlain be moved to the starting rotation, the team will stick to its plan.
snippet: Yankees’ general manager Brian Cashman said that despite Hank Steinbrenner’s insistence that Joba Chamberlain be moved to the starting rotation, the team will stick to its plan.
